The Ordinance Committee will conduct a public hearing on the Alewife Quadrangle Northwest
Overlay petition.
1.

A Zoning Petition Has been received from Arvind Srinivasan regarding zoning language relative to
the Alewife Quadrangle Northwest overlay

2.

A communication was received from JACOB VANCE, Senior Development Manager of Cabot,
Cabot & Forbes, transmitting a communication for the December 16, 2020 meeting of the Ordinance
Committee.

3.

A communication was received from Jeffrey Roberts, Director of Zoning and Development,
transmitting a memorandum from the Community Development Department regarding the Alewife
Quadrangle Northwest (Srinivasan, et al.) Zoning Petition

City of Cambridge
